review: My mother in law had visited the hospital as she had back pain. ****** *** ***** I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Painkillers were prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done. Physiotherapy was suggested. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went, it was for 30 minutes. My mother in law is aged and was not able to walk properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Back in 2002, I met with a bike accident soon after my Engineering graduation with distinction.  First I was admitted and operated with one private nursing home who spoiled my life completely.  I got a Savior doctor Dr.  Anand sir who operated me with Ilizarov technology.  Myself and my parents are totally indebted to him.  ** ** *** ** ***  New bone of 14 CM grown and am happily walking thereafter....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 1st thing is I got treatment by half an hour delay2nd thing is he suggested me to take X-Ray *** * ********* ** ****** *** ********* later he suggested to take MRI after few days!!! and suggested physiotherapy which may be correct and X-Report explaination was ****** **** *** **** *** not satisfactory.3rd thing is i really wasted my time
Medicine suggested was unavailable in any of the surrounding areas/online. When requested on call to suggest a alternative, he suggests just go to medical shop and ask them.

Since I had my recent reports in hand, I was not given any test recommendations. The waiting period was good enough. I didn't encounter any issues anywhere during my consultation. Everything was fine. I am happy with the treatment as well.
